THE SPARK PLATFORM

An online centralized database of social impact organizations in the Bay Area

Our Mission

Spark Social Impact is a centralized platform to spark interest in student leaders & young professionals about careers in the social impact space. Our tool highlights opportunities & organizations contributing to a common goal, focusing on opportunities available in the Bay Area (California). After university, the common mentality of students often revolves around the choice of pursuing a corporate career, achieving “financial success”, & then turning to philanthropy to drive change OR pursuing a career in the nonprofit world & sacrificing financial means. We seek to introduce a third option: pursuing a career that optimizes technology, entrepreneurship, & unique structural models to create lasting impact through a less-traditional route.
